website_summaries.verdict: The Under Armour Ultimate Speed was said to be very comfortable from the moment you put it on your foot. Its construction also offered ample support at the arch and ankle areas. Though the sock-like fit pleased many users, there were also complaints about a break-in period. But in the end, the product’s versatility and stability during dynamic workouts were reason enough for purchasers to recommend it to their peers.
pros: A majority of the owners marveled at how comfortable the Under Armour Ultimate Speed was from the moment they put it on until they took it off
The product was considered versatile as many used it for various activities such as running, walking, and cross-training
Numerous users liked the overall design of the shoe
The footgear was true to size and fit like a sock, as stated by multiple reviewers
Plenty of consumers were very satisfied with the arch and ankle support offered by this training shoe
A lot of training aficionados raved about the stability of the sole unit during high-intensity workouts
The lightweight nature of the footwear impressed more than a few purchasers
A couple of individuals commended the traction of the outsole
cons: Several people noted that the midfoot felt too tight and needed breaking to fit comfortably
The rounded toe box was too spacious for a handful of testers
The laces were too long, said some critics

customer_reviews.title: Shoes fit like a tailored glove, but you’ll need super glue!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit like a tailored glove. I have only worn them while I exercise 6-7 times a week for a little over a month. I do cross training, sled pushes, weight lifting, HIIT kickboxing, kicking a heavy bag and pads also use them on treadmill they feel great in each activity. These shoes have thus far stood up to everything I’ve used them for and on various surfaces while still holding form and structure. Then a little before the two month mark parts of the sole started coming undone, I’d give it a lower rating but they fit my feet too well. Time to buy some super glue I guess.
customer_reviews.author: MealPrepper

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, functional sports shoes
customer_reviews.text: My 13-year old boy wants this style, US size 7. I wanted to buy on Under Armour’s website, but it does not accept credit cards outside of the US, so I had to buy it on Amazon. It is the Under Armour quality as expected, my boy wears it everyday, it works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Yeh

customer_reviews.title: Good arch support and lateral stability
customer_reviews.text: I need strong arch support which is very hard to find in athletic shoes, This shoe has that plus good lateral support, but it lacks flexibility and cushioning. I will use this shoe only on days that my program is limited to the weight room.
customer_reviews.author: JakeIIVV

customer_reviews.title: UA  Athletic Shoes Disappoint
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these shoes in September for use as a workout shoe. The bottom sole (blue sections) began to come apart. I've actually glued one back together several times. No issue with the vendor...it's the shoes that have disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Corrales

customer_reviews.title: A little tight but adequate
customer_reviews.text: Needed a new pair of shoes for training at the gym. Wire Cutter gave a very high rating so bought them. While moving in the gym they give good support but are too tight for sitting around, like for a two hour car ride.
customer_reviews.author: Bob-O

customer_reviews.title: Good buy but run small
customer_reviews.text: Nice for daily wear and workouts but they run small.
customer_reviews.author: CM Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Used!
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoes, but they came very obviously used. There is dirt and a small amount of gravel in the soles and a scuff on the inside of one of the toe boxes. The shoes for great, but I'm not sure why I'm paying new shoe prices for shoes that have obviously been used.
customer_reviews.author: RDange

customer_reviews.title: Painfully narrow
customer_reviews.text: I never needed a shoehorn to put on sneakers before.
customer_reviews.author: Dr B

customer_reviews.title: for the price the best pair of workout shoes I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, for the price the best pair of workout shoes I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Vanderbeck

customer_reviews.title: Get a half size for a wider size.
customer_reviews.text: They fit a bit large. I went for half a size larger ( 11.5) for extra room. Not too big tho, the width is ok
customer_reviews.author: James Deery III

customer_reviews.title: ... my first purchase from this company and this is amazing, color is so cool
customer_reviews.text: I always want to be the men who waering the under armour shoes i it was my first purchase from this company and this is amazing, color is so cool, material is the best thank you under armour appreciate that😉
customer_reviews.author: Rezi

customer_reviews.title: I'll order another one.
customer_reviews.text: These are nice shoes. Just make sure to order a half size larger
customer_reviews.author: Mike P

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit and Extremely Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable and true to size! Both my husband and one son wear a men's 10 sneaker. They both tried them on and they fit like a glove! Both said they provided great support and stability. My son said he felt about a 1/4" taller in them and immediately took possession! Overall, a great look on both of them. We own many Under Armour brand items and have always been pleased with their quality. These sneakers look to be of the same quality we have grown to love! It is certainly a plus the shoelaces are not super long. Another win for the Under Armour collection! Looks like I have to buy my husband a pair now.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Great for average build - not so much for wide/high arch, etc.
customer_reviews.text: This is a lightweight, supportive shoe that is great for someone who works on his feet all day. I LOVE that it's not memory foam insole. Am I the only one who hates that inside my shoes??? The only concern I would have for this shoe would be that the lacing does not open up all the way in the traditional sense. The "sock fit" style means that those with large ankles or high arches might have a difficult time squeezing into these, and I don't think I would want them under those circumstances. But for my average build, it works wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver DeMille, TJEd

customer_reviews.title: These are much better!!
customer_reviews.text: These are much better!!! They provide great support and are much comfortable and easier to put on and out. The size was right for my husband. I ordered him a 10 M, (he normally wears 9.5 and it was a true fit). The shoes look very good on him, modern and very versatile.
customer_reviews.author: Roxana

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes!  They're super comfortable and look great.
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! They're comfortable and look good. I usually wear a 9 1/2, but the 10's fit just perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: K Dude

customer_reviews.title: Remove the insole
customer_reviews.text: I removed the insole and they felt much better. Not a lot of volume for the insohle. I wore them hard for 2 years before the glue fAiled but I’m buying another pair.
customer_reviews.author: mike ob

product_meta.title: Under Armour Men's Ultimate Speed ​​Training Shoes, Men's Man Shoes
product_meta.description: These shoes have been created for athletes who intensify their workouts with more sustained heart rate activity sessions. They offer the additional stability, flexibility and speed needed to move faster and longer. The breathable upper keeps feet cool and light The dynamic coating on the forefoot ensures lateral stability and increased support The shaped collar padding offers an anatomically correct fit for maximum comfort The full length EVA midsole melded on the foot is modelled on the foot to avoid slippage and guarantee the maximum comfort of the sole of the foot The dual density insole allows flexible forefoot movement, provides excellent cushioning at the heel and provides support for the medial arch The shock-absorbing inserts strategically positioned under the forefoot and the compact EVA foam inserted under the heel to increase stability make this shoe ideal for moving from the treadmill to the weight room The non-slip rubber sole has deep grooves for greater flexibility Pattern of the customized sole for greater grip and grip on every surface Differential: 6 mm Weight: 280 g
feature_bullets: The breathable upper keeps feet cool and light
The dynamic coating on the forefoot ensures lateral stability and increased support
The shaped collar padding offers an anatomically correct fit for maximum comfort
Dual density insole allows flexible forefoot movement, excellent cushioning at the heel and provides support for the medial arch
Full length EVA midsole is modelled on the foot to avoid slippage and guarantee the maximum comfort of the sole of the foot
